title: Lookism
overview: The ugliest guy in school undergoes a miraculous transformation overnight that allows him to possess two different bodies, thus giving him a chance to start a new life.After being constantly bullied and ridiculed in his old school, Wen Shuai finally gets the courage to transfer. One night, he comes into the possession of two bodies: one is his original body and the other has the visuals of everyone's ideal guy. Wen Shuai learns that his consciousness can easily travel between the two bodies; when one is awake, the other will remain unconscious. As he begins to enjoy new privileges as another person, Wen Shuai discovers that there is a hidden secret behind his handsome facade.
